lyrics.japanese: 明日 今日よりも好きになれる
lyrics.romaji: ashita kyou yori mo suki ni nareru
lyrics.english: Tomorrow I can love you more than today

lyrics.japanese: 溢れる想いが止まらない
lyrics.english: These overflowing feelings won't stop

lyrics.japanese: 今もこんなに好きでいるのに
lyrics.romaji: ima mo konna ni suki de iru no ni
lyrics.english: Even though I love you so much right now

lyrics.japanese: 言葉に出来ない
lyrics.english: I can't put it into words

lyrics.japanese: 君のくれた日々が積み重なり
lyrics.romaji: kimi no kureta hibi ga tsumikasanari
lyrics.english: The days you gave me pile up

lyrics.japanese: 過ぎ去った日々2人歩いた『軌跡』
lyrics.english: The path we walked together through those past days

lyrics.japanese: 僕らの出逢いがもし偶然ならば?
lyrics.romaji: bokura no deai ga moshi guuzen naraba?
lyrics.english: If our meeting was by chance?

lyrics.japanese: 運命ならば?
lyrics.english: If it was destiny?

lyrics.japanese: 君に巡り合えた それって『奇跡』
lyrics.english: Meeting you - that's a miracle

lyrics.japanese: 2人寄り添って歩いて
lyrics.english: Walking together, side by side

lyrics.japanese: 永久の愛を形にして
lyrics.romaji: towa no ai no katachi ni shite
lyrics.english: Giving shape to eternal love

lyrics.japanese: いつまでも君の横で
lyrics.english: Forever by your side

lyrics.japanese: 笑っていたくて
lyrics.english: I want to keep smiling

lyrics.japanese: アリガトウや ah 愛してるじゃまだ足りないけど
lyrics.romaji: arigatou ya ah aishiteru ja mada tarinai kedo
lyrics.english: Thank you or 'I love you' still isn't enough, but

lyrics.japanese: せめて言わせて 「幸せです」と
lyrics.english: At least let me say 'I am happy'

lyrics.japanese: いつも君の右の手の平を
lyrics.romaji: itsumo kimi no migi no te no hira wo
lyrics.english: Your right palm always

lyrics.japanese: ただ僕の左の手の平が
lyrics.romaji: tada boku no hidari no te no hira ga
lyrics.english: My left palm simply

lyrics.japanese: そっと包んでくそれだけで
lyrics.romaji: sotto tsutsunde ku sore dake de
lyrics.english: Gently wraps around it, just that

lyrics.japanese: ただ愛を感じていた
lyrics.english: I simply felt love

lyrics.japanese: 日々の中で 小さな幸せ
lyrics.romaji: hibi no naka de chiisana shiawase
lyrics.english: In daily life, small happiness

lyrics.japanese: 見つけ重ね ゆっくり歩いた『軌跡』
lyrics.english: Finding and layering, the path we slowly walked

lyrics.japanese: 僕らの出会いは大きな世界で
lyrics.romaji: bokura no deai wa ookina sekai de
lyrics.english: Our meeting in this big world

lyrics.japanese: 小さな出来事
lyrics.english: Was a small event

lyrics.japanese: 巡り合えた それって『奇跡』
lyrics.english: Meeting each other - that's a miracle

lyrics.japanese: うまく行かない日だって
lyrics.english: Even on days when things don't go well

lyrics.japanese: 2人で居れば晴れだって!
lyrics.english: If we're together, it's sunny!

lyrics.japanese: 強がりや寂しさも
lyrics.english: Putting on a brave face and loneliness too

lyrics.japanese: 忘れられるから
lyrics.english: Can be forgotten

lyrics.japanese: 僕は君でなら 僕で居れるから!
lyrics.romaji: boku wa kimi de nara boku de ireru kara!
lyrics.english: With you, I can be myself!

lyrics.japanese: だからいつも そばにいてよ 『愛しい君へ』
lyrics.romaji: dakara itsumo soba ni ite yo 'itoshii kimi e'
lyrics.english: So always stay by my side, 'to my beloved you'

lyrics.japanese: 2人フザけあった帰り道
lyrics.english: The way home where we both fooled around

lyrics.japanese: それも大切な僕らの日々
lyrics.romaji: sore mo taisetsu na bokura no hibi
lyrics.english: That too is part of our precious days

lyrics.japanese: 「想いよ届け!!!」と伝えた時に
lyrics.romaji: 'omoi yo todoke!!!' to tsutaeta toki ni
lyrics.english: When I said 'Let my feelings reach you!!!'

lyrics.japanese: 初めて見せた表情の君
lyrics.english: The expression you showed for the first time

lyrics.japanese: 少し間が空いて 君がうなずいて
lyrics.romaji: sukoshi ma ga aite kimi ga unazuite
lyrics.english: After a brief pause, you nodded

lyrics.japanese: 僕らの心 満たされてく愛で
lyrics.romaji: bokura no kokoro mitasarete ku ai de
lyrics.english: Our hearts filled with growing love

lyrics.japanese: ぼくらまだ旅の途中で
lyrics.romaji: bokura mada tabi no tochuu de
lyrics.english: We're still in the middle of our journey

lyrics.japanese: またこれから先も 何十年
lyrics.romaji: mata kore kara saki mo nanjuunen
lyrics.english: And from now on, for decades more

lyrics.japanese: 続いていけるような未来へ
lyrics.romaji: tsuzuite ikeru you na mirai e
lyrics.english: Toward a future we can continue together

lyrics.japanese: 例えばほら 明日を見失いそうに
lyrics.romaji: tatoeba hora ashita wo miushinai sou ni
lyrics.english: For example, look, even if we seem to lose sight of tomorrow

lyrics.japanese: 僕らなったとしても
lyrics.english: Even if we become like that

lyrics.japanese: 2人寄り添って歩いて
lyrics.english: Walking together, side by side

lyrics.japanese: 永久の愛を形にして
lyrics.romaji: towa no ai no katachi ni shite
lyrics.english: Giving shape to eternal love

lyrics.japanese: いつまでも君の横で
lyrics.english: Forever by your side

lyrics.japanese: 笑っていたくて
lyrics.english: I want to keep smiling

lyrics.japanese: アリガトウや ah 愛してるじゃまだ足りないけど
lyrics.romaji: arigatou ya ah aishiteru ja mada tarinai kedo
lyrics.english: Thank you or 'I love you' still isn't enough, but

lyrics.japanese: せめて言わせて 「幸せです」と
lyrics.english: At least let me say 'I am happy'

lyrics.japanese: うまく行かない日だって
lyrics.english: Even on days when things don't go well

lyrics.japanese: 2人で居れば晴れだって!
lyrics.english: If we're together, it's sunny!

lyrics.japanese: 喜びや悲しみも
lyrics.english: Joy and sadness too

lyrics.japanese: 全て分け合える
lyrics.english: We can share everything

lyrics.japanese: 君がいるから 生きていけるから!
lyrics.romaji: kimi ga iru kara ikite ikeru kara!
lyrics.english: Because you're here, I can keep living!

lyrics.japanese: だからいつも そばにいてよ 『愛しい君へ』
lyrics.romaji: dakara itsumo soba ni ite yo 'itoshii kimi e'
lyrics.english: So always stay by my side, 'to my beloved you'

lyrics.japanese: 最後の一秒まで
lyrics.english: Until the very last second

lyrics.japanese: 明日 今日より笑顔になれる 君がいるだけで そう思えるから 何十年 何百年 何千年 時を超えよう 君を愛してる
lyrics.romaji: ashita kyou yori egao ni nareru kimi ga iru dake de sou omoeru kara nanjuunen nanbyakun nansennen toki wo koeyou kimi wo aishiteru
lyrics.english: Tomorrow I can smile more than today, just because you're here I can think so. Decades, centuries, thousands of years - let's transcend time. I love you
